item.title: On Forecasting AIMSR 2025 - Part 1 / N
item.description: Introduction In this post, we will analyse India’s historic monsoon rainfall patterns. This analysis is the first step (i.e. 1 / N) to accurately and timely forecast All India Summer Monsoon Rainfall (AISMR) 2025 - and compare it with IMD’s official forecast released in May 2025. Data Collection We require India’s historic rainfall data. IMD Pune provides us with daily rainfall data over each \(0.25\degree * 0.25\degree\) grid over India for the time range \(1901 - 2024\).
